subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Matt Kuchar struggled at the outset, making five bogeys and a birdie through 10 holes at the BMW Championship, before his closing kick tied Charlie Wi (69) atop the leader board at six-under 136.
snippet: Matt Kuchar struggled at the outset, making five bogeys and a birdie through 10 holes at the BMW Championship, before his closing kick tied Charlie Wi (69) atop the leader board at six-under 136.
